attributes.review: this app is not it sis 😤😤😤 took several hours to download 😰😰😰 when it finally did it froze upon opening for like 30 minutes 😩😩😩 then i was greeted with an ugli prune looking man 🤮🤮🤮 i haven’t been able to eat for three days since 😞😞😞 looked into who this man is and found out he’s a racist misogynistic homophobic and xenophobic pr*dator 🤔🤔🤔 phone has been acting up ever since 🥶🥶🥶 0 stars i want my time back 🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️

Do not download this app— it gave my phone a virus so bad that my phone turned scorching hot when I touched it, and when I plugged my phone into the outlet to charge it, my outlet exploded. Do not download this absolutely trash app.
attributes.title: Do not download. Gave me a virus.

attributes.review: This app was the reason my turtle passed away. My turtle saw it downloaded on my phone and decided the only way to escape from this app is to kill itself so I’m giving this app one star cuz I can’t give lower😠
attributes.title: Trump was impeached🤣

attributes.review: so i have a genuine love for naked mole rats, i get it, people don’t usually like them, but i admire how progressive they are a a species despite how they look. my buddy referred me to this app so i can buy my 12th mole rat, but when i opened it i was disappointed. it’s advertised as if they sell the naked mole rats, but it’s just people imitating the animals. and i don’t like it, they are not progressing at all as a species, they’re just ugly. you owe me a mole rat trump!!!!!
attributes.title: i just wanted to buy a mole rat

attributes.review: Once I downloaded the app and tried to open it it glitched out and made my phone screen go GREEN!!! I tried restarting my phone but it’s a brick now!!!! 1 Star absolutely horrible :(
attributes.title: My Information!!!

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app my phone started acting weird and I got a text from a random number claiming that if I don’t vote for trump, he’ll send me back to my village in Vietnam to grow rice. Help. Don’t download.✨🧚🏻‍♂️🦋
attributes.title: hacks your phone😝🧚🏻‍♂️✨🦋

attributes.review: It’s really bad and it’s really slow takes a while to download and the content is not the teachable like really boring. It takes a while to download and takes full space of my phone so PLEASE DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP and it glitches allot as welll😡😡😡🤬.
attributes.title: APP IS NOT GOOD AT All

attributes.review: This app is not user friendly at all it’s taken me over three hours to figure out how to open the app. I’m still having trouble.. 0/10 do no recommend
attributes.title: Not a great app

attributes.review: i recently downloaded the app to keep up with the “president” after i unfortunately missed the Tulsa rally because i had to walk my pet moss rock. 💀😣 Very upset the cheeto never did anything significant or worthwhile for his career.
attributes.title: awful😭😔

attributes.review: This app is so bad I downloaded it and it wiped everything from my phone, but not after hacking into all my accounts and stealing all my information and money.
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever used
